00062 bool CDoorControl::Initialize(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00063         // Get first frame from file or camera
00064         image.CopyOf(input);
00065         if (m_hWnd)
00066                 MoveWindow(0,0,image.Width(),image.Height(), true);
00067         return true;

00069 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 void CDoorControl::OnLButtonUp(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00071 {
00072         CWnd::OnLButtonUp(nFlags, point);
00073         CDoorDialog* dlg=((CDoorDialog*)this->GetParent());
00074         dlg->door.Add(Door(point));
00075         Invalidate();
00076         UpdateWindow();
00077 }
00078 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 void CDoorControl::DrawItem(LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT lpDrawItemStruct) {
00080         CDC* pDC = CDC::FromHandle(lpDrawItemStruct->hDC);
00081         image.Show(pDC->m_hDC, 0, 0, image.Width(), image.Height(), 0,0);
00082         CDoorDialog* dlg=((CDoorDialog*)this->GetParent());
00083         pDC->SelectObject(new CBrush(RGB(255, 255, 0)));
00084         for (int i=0;i<dlg->door.GetSize();i++) {
00085                 Door d = dlg->door[i];
00086                 pDC->Ellipse(d.x-2*DOT, d.y-2*DOT, d.x+2*DOT, d.y+2*DOT);
00087         }
00088 }
